subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Possibly an {{der|zh|map}} loan, since this kind of axe has been discovered in archaeological sites in areas where Austronesian languages were once spoken; compare {{cog|poz-pro|*wasay||axe}} ({{zh-ref|Mahdi, 1994}}; {{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). Also compare {{cog|mkh-pro|*wac||knife; sword}}, {{cog|omx|rwas||weapon}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|historical}} a type of [[battle axe]] used in ancient China
